name: trab-1-prog-distr

scripts.copy-non-ts-files: cp -r src/configurations/requests build/configurations/requests && cp -r src/resources build/resources
scripts.as-super-node: npx tsc && npm run copy-non-ts-files && node build/index.js super-node
scripts.as-peer-node: npx tsc && npm run copy-non-ts-files && node build/index.js peer-node
scripts.start: npm run generate-files && docker compose up --build
